author: rhuijben
msg: Resolve a race condition when initializing openssl for ssl buckets from
(have_init_ssl): Add volatile to make some developers happy. (See #svn-dev)
(init_ssl_libraries): Wait while another thread is busy initializing
instead of just going on as if it is already done.

author: rhuijben
msg: The auth layer should properly report discarded application requests to the
Without this patch, the application will have to wait forever (or until the
connection is reset) to be sure it won't be called ever again. As the auth
layer creates new requests on behalf of the application the application can't
(serf__handle_auth_response): Call the application callback before returning
an error code that will just discard the request as finished.
